RouteTable¶

class seshat.route_table.RouteTable[source]¶
get(request)[source]¶

Attempts to find the closest match to the given url. Its messy but it gets the job done. mostly well. not sure on the amount of processing time it has or hasn’t saved however, but it doesn’t use regex... :/

Parsed_url:urlparse.ParseResult
